char_248_mgllan_1.name: Magallan
desc: Complete 5 operations and summon Magallan's summoned units at least 5 times in each operation (Magallan cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 2-5 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Magallan must be deployed during the operation and only Vanguard operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_336_folivo_1.name: Scene
desc: Complete 5 operations and summon Scene's summoned units at least 5 times in each operation (Scene cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 3-1 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Scene must be deployed during the operation and only Sniper operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_242_otter_1.name: Mayer
desc: Complete 5 operations and summon Mayer's summoned units at least 5 times in each operation (Mayer cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 2-9 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 3 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Mayer must be deployed during the operation and only Sniper operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_110_deepcl_1.name: Deepcolor
desc: Summon a total of 20 summoned units with Deepcolor (Deepcolor cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-4 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 1 unit; only a non-Support Deepcolor may be in the squad

char_485_pallas_1.name: Pallas
desc: Defeat a total of 50 enemies with Pallas (Pallas cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 3-6 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Pallas must be deployed during the operation and only Medic operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_265_sophia_1.name: Whislash
desc: Defeat a total of 50 enemies with Whislash (Whislash cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme S3-6 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Whislash must be deployed during the operation and only Defender operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_308_swire_1.name: Swire
desc: Clear 5 operations with Swire (Swire cannot be a Support Unit); only Guard operators are allowed for the remaining units

Clear Main Theme S2-3 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Swire must be deployed during the operation and only Melee operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_130_doberm_1.name: Dobermann
desc: Clear 5 operations with Dobermann (Dobermann cannot be a Support Unit); only 3-star operators are allowed for the remaining units
Clear Main Theme 1-12 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Dobermann must be deployed during the operation and only 3-star operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_430_fartth_1.name: Fartooth
desc: Defeat a total of 80 enemies with Fartooth (Fartooth cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme S2-2 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Fartooth must be deployed during the operation, and Fartooth must defeat at least 8 enemies with Feathershine Arrows

char_158_milu_1.name: Firewatch
desc: Defeat a total of 25 enemy ranged units with Firewatch (Firewatch cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-10 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Firewatch must be deployed during the operation, and Firewatch must defeat Skullshatterer

char_218_cuttle_1.name: Andreana
desc: Deal a total of 150,000 damage with Andreana (Andreana cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 3-2 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Andreana must be deployed during the operation, and Andreana must defeat at least 15 enemies

char_302_glaze_1.name: Ambriel
desc: Defeat a total of 30 enemies with Ambriel's Radar Sweep (Ambriel cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-7 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Ambriel must be deployed during the operation, and Ambriel must defeat at least 6 Infused Originium Slugs

char_179_cgbird_1.name: Nightingale
desc: Summon a total of 10 summoned units with Nightingale (Nightingale cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 3-6 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Nightingale must be deployed during the operation, and Nightingale must use Arts Shield 10 times

char_128_plosis_1.name: Ptilopsis
desc: During battle, have Ptilopsis use Enkephalin 8 times (Ptilopsis cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-9 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Ptilopsis must be deployed during the operation, and any other Medic Operators or Defender Operators are not allowed for the remaining units

char_275_breeze_1.name: Breeze
desc: During battle, have Breeze fire a total of 50 healing rounds (Breeze cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-1 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Breeze must be deployed during the operation, and only 7 Operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_181_flower_1.name: Perfumer
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; In each battle, a non-Support Perfumer must be deployed once at least
Clear Main Theme 3-4 with a 3-star rating; only a non-Support Perfumer is allowed as the only Medic Operator

char_250_phatom_1.name: Phantom
desc: Defeat a total of 70 enemies with Phantom (Phantom cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 3-6 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Phantom, and have Phantom defeat at least 6 Invisible Casters

char_214_kafka_1.name: Kafka
desc: Defeat a total of 50 enemies with Kafka's skills (Kafka cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-7 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Kafka, and have Kafka's skills defeat at least 10 enemies

char_144_red_1.name: Projekt Red
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; In each battle, you must deploy your own Projekt Red at least 3 times
Clear Main Theme S4-5 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Projekt Red, and have Projekt Red defeat at least 4 Infused Originium Slugs

char_243_waaifu_1.name: Waai Fu
desc: Defeat a total of 50 Infected Creatures with Waai Fu's skill Seven-styles Kick (Waai Fu cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-7 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Waai Fu, and only 6 other Operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_237_gravel_1.name: Gravel
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; In each battle, you must deploy your own Gravel at least 4 times
Clear Main Theme 4-8 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Gravel, and allow no Operators to be defeated

char_472_pasngr_1.name: Passenger
desc: During battle, have Passenger use Glorious Shards a total of 30 times (Passenger cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-2 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Passenger, and only Vanguard and Defender Operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_306_leizi_1.name: Leizi
desc: Defeat a total of 50 enemies with Leizi's skill Thunderclap (Leizi cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme S3-6 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Leizi, and have Leizi defeat at least 1 Butcher

char_4004_pudd_1.name: Pudding
desc: Deal a total of 150,000 damage with Pudding (Pudding cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-10 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Pudding, and have Pudding's skill Diffusion Current defeat at least 2 Heavy Defenders

char_010_chen_1.name: Ch'en
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; You must deploy your own Ch'en, and unleash Chi Xiao - Unsheath or Chi Xiao - Shadowless at least 1 time in each battle
Clear Main Theme 5-8 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Ch'en, and have Ch'en defeat at least 16 enemies

char_459_tachak_1.name: Tachanka
desc: Deal a total of 150,000 damage with Tachanka (excluding Support Units)

Clear Main Story S2-3 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Tachanka must be in the squad and deployed, and only Defender operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_252_bibeak_1.name: Bibeak
desc: During battle, have Bibeak use Blade Swap a total of 16 times (excluding Support Units)
Clear Main Theme 3-7 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Bibeak, and have Bibeak defeat at least 1 Heavy Defender Leader

char_301_cutter_1.name: Cutter
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; You must deploy your own Cutter, and have Cutter defeat at least 3 enemy Drones in each battle
Clear Main Theme 2-7 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Cutter, and have Cutter defeat at least 2 Defender-4s with Crimson Crescent

char_222_bpipe_1.name: Bagpipe
desc: Defeat a total of 80 enemies with Bagpipe (excluding Support Units)
Clear Main Theme 4-5 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Bagpipe, and have Bagpipe defeat at least 4 Arts Guards

char_220_grani_1.name: Grani
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; You must include your own Grani, and Grani must be the first Operator deployed
Clear Side Story GT-6 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Grani, and have Grani defeat 8 enemies

char_496_wildmn_1.name: Wild Mane
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; You must include your own Wild Mane, and Wild Mane must be the first Operator deployed
Clear Side Story MN-2 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Wild Mane, and cannot include any other Vanguard Operators as members

char_261_sddrag_1.name: Reed
desc: Defeat a total of 70 enemies with Reed (excluding Support Units)
Clear Main Theme 9-5 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Reed, and cannot include any other Vanguard Operators as members

char_290_vigna_1.name: Vigna
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; You must include your own Vigna, and Vigna must be the first Operator deployed
Clear Main Theme 3-3 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Vigna, and have Vigna defeat 8 enemies
